width.description: The width of the gauge. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).

height.description: The height of the gauge. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).

backingBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use to fill the backing of the linear gauge.

backingInnerExtent.description: Gets or sets the inner extent of the linear gauge backing.

backingOuterExtent.description: Gets or sets the outer extent of the linear gauge backing.

backingOutline.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outline of the backing.

backingStrokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the stroke thickness of the backing outline.

fontBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the label font.

interval.description: Gets or sets the interval to use for the scale.

isScaleInverted.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the scale is inverted.
 When the scale is inverted the direction in which the scale values increase is right to left.

labelExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to put the labels as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the bottom of the scale.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to hide the labels of the linear gauge.

labelInterval.description: Gets or sets the interval to use for rendering labels. This defaults to be the same interval as the tickmarks on the scale.

labelsPostInitial.description: A value to start adding labels, added to the scale's MinimumValue.

labelsPreTerminal.description: A value to stop adding labels, subtracted from the scale's MaximumValue.

maximumValue.description: Gets or sets the maximum value of the scale.

minimumValue.description: Gets or sets the minimum value of the scale.

minorTickBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the minor tickmarks.

minorTickCount.description: Gets or sets the number of minor tickmarks to place between major tickmarks.

minorTickEndExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the minor tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

minorTickStartExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the minor tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

minorTickStrokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the stroke thickness to use when rendering minor ticks.

needleBreadth.description: Gets or sets the needle breadth.

needleBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for needle element.

needleInnerBaseWidth.description: Gets or sets the width of the needle's inner base.

needleInnerExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the needle geometry, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge as a value from 0 to 1.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

needleInnerPointExtent.description: Gets or sets the extent of the needle's inner point.

needleInnerPointWidth.description: Gets or sets the width of the needle's inner point.

needleName.description: Gets or sets the name used for needle.

needleOuterBaseWidth.description: Gets or sets the width of the needle's outer base.

needleOuterExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the needle geometry as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

needleOuterPointExtent.description: Gets or sets the extent of the needle's outer point.

needleOuterPointWidth.description: Gets or sets the width of the needle's outer point.

needleOutline.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outline of needle element.

needleShape.description: Gets or sets the shape to use when rendering the needle from a number of options.

valueOptions.name: custom
valueOptions.description: Custom shape is used when rendering the needle

valueOptions.name: rectangle
valueOptions.description: Rectangle shape is used when rendering the needle

valueOptions.name: triangle
valueOptions.description: Trianle shape is used when rendering the needle

valueOptions.name: needle
valueOptions.description: Needle shape is used when rendering the needle

valueOptions.name: trapezoid
valueOptions.description: Trapezoid shape is used when rendering the needle

needleStrokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the stroke thickness to use when rendering single actual value element.

needleToolTipTemplate.description: Gets or sets the needle's tooltip template.

orientation.description: Gets or sets the orientation of the scale.

valueOptions.name: horizontal
valueOptions.description: The orientation of the scale is horizontal

valueOptions.name: vertical
valueOptions.description: The orientation of the scale is vertical

rangeBrushes.description:
Gets or sets a collection of brushes to be used as the palette for linear gauge ranges.
 The value provided should be an array of css color strings or JavaScript objects defining gradients. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection.

rangeInnerExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the ranges, measured from the front/bottom of the control as a value from 0 to 1.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

rangeOuterExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the range as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

rangeOutlines.description:
Gets or sets a collection of brushes to be used as the palette for linear gauge outlines.
 The value provided should be an array of css color strings or JavaScript objects defining gradients. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection.

name.description: The value provided should be css color string or JavaScript object defining gradients. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection.

ranges.description: Gets or sets the scale ranges to render on the linear gauge.

startValue.description: The start value of the range

endValue.description: The end value of the range

brush.description: Gets or sets the brush for the entire range.

startExtent.description: Gets or sets the starting value of the extent of the range.

endExtent.description: Gets or sets the ending value of the extent of the range.

outline.description: Gets or sets the brush for the outline of the range.

remove.description: Gets or sets the flag used to determine if the range should be removed. If set to true, the range (if existing) is removed.

strokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the thickness of the range outline.

rangeToolTipTemplate.description: Gets or sets the ranges' tooltip template.

scaleBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use to fill the scale of the linear gauge.

scaleEndExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the scale as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

scaleInnerExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the scale, measured from the bottom/front (when orientation is horizontal/vertical) of the control as a value from 0 to 1.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

scaleOuterExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the scale as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the bottom/front (when orientation is horizontal/vertical) of the linear gauge.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

scaleOutline.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outline of the scale.

scaleStartExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the scale, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge as a value from 0 to 1.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

scaleStrokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the stroke thickness of the scale outline.

showToolTip.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether tooltips are enabled.

showToolTipTimeout.description: Gets or sets the time in milliseconds that tooltip appearance is delayed with.

tickBrush.description: Gets or sets the brush to use for the major tickmarks.

tickEndExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to stop rendering the major tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

ticksPostInitial.description: A value to start adding tickmarks, added to the scale's MinimumValue.

ticksPreTerminal.description: A value to stop adding tickmarks, subtracted from the scale's MaximumValue.

tickStartExtent.description:
Gets or sets the position at which to start rendering the major tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge.
 Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

tickStrokeThickness.description: Gets or sets the stroke thickness to use when rendering ticks.

transitionDuration.description: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds over which changes to the linear gauge should be animated.

value.description: Gets or sets the value at which the needle is positioned.
